title: Texas Sues U.S. Over Airport Mask Mandate
sub_head: State attorney general says CDC exceeded its authority
body:
Texas is challenging the federal airport mask mandate.
The stateâ€™s attorney general, Ken Paxton, and Rep. Beth Van Duyne (R., Texas) on Wednesday sued the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, alleging the agency exceeded its authority in requiring face masks in airports and on planes.
